commit message: Put an empty adapter in the view, so LMA does not crash when the user pauses the app while the listtask is still collecting data
BUGFIX: Use unicode to express angle brackets. The entity encoding seems to have caused some problems for some devices.
The copy action had the wrong icon.
BUGFIX: Made the template editor usable on small screens.
BUGFIX: Less padding on the checkbox to accomidate smaller screens.
BUGFIX:  center the template editor on the screen
BUGFIX: Wrapped the checkbox in a container. It now centers more gracefully and no longer paints the text over the button on small screens.
BUGFIX: Prevent appname/pacakgename from painting over the checkbox
BUGFIX: Added menu icons(for those still stuck on Gingerbread)
BUGFIX: Added icons to the template editor menu for the sake of completeness.
